FuncDef: The reset msdp control-message counters command clears the statistics about the received, sent, and discarded Multicast Source Discovery Protocol (MSDP) messages. The reset msdp control-message counters command clears the statistics about the received, sent, and discarded Multicast Source Discovery Protocol (MSDP) messages.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies IP address of MSDP peer.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.
